title: World
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from World, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: US says progress made at talks with Ukraine on plan to end war
items.description: Talks between senior US and Ukrainian negotiators in Florida continue for a third day on Saturday.

items.description: The Fifa World Cup 2026 draw features on several Saturday editions.

items.title: Deadly border fighting breaks out between Pakistan and Afghanistan
items.description: Both sides accuse the other of starting the overnight fighting and breaching a fragile ceasefire agreed in October.

items.title: Driving-test touts offer instructors £250 kickbacks so they can bulk-book tests
items.description: Touts use instructor login details to bulk-book tests and sell them at a huge mark-up, the BBC finds.
